description_of_product/service: Amazon Robotics builds high-performance, real-time robotic systems
Invent and scale AI systems for robotics in fulfillment
Building computer vision systems, ML and AI models, robotic control and motion planning, process management
End-to-end ownership of decision explanation, fault detection, monitoring, A/B testing, large scale model training, simulation, hardware integration
responsibilities: Plan roadmap, design ML systems, implement, test, monitor services
goals/objectives: Invent and scale AI systems for robotics in fulfillment
required_qualifications: Programming experience in Java, C++, or C#
1+ years contributing to architecture and design
preferred_qualifications: 3+ years full software development life cycle
Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent
Robotics experience with focus on machine learning, computer vision, hardware integration, safety-critical systems
